entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023
